entry.em: ..DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CST FRIDAY

entry.data:
CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN LATE THIS EVENING, THEN A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
AREAS OF DENSE FOG
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 50
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 50
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS AROUND 60

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN RAIN LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH RAIN LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT
